original: Berglund, Sannfred Robert Stig, civilingenjör, Osbruk, f. 2/12/16 i Fors bruk, Kopparb. 1., av dir. Erik B. o. Lotten Sundelin. G. 44 m. Ingegerd Mimmi Enquist. — Stud:ex. i Växjö 35, avg:ex. fr. Schartaus’ hand:inst. 36, fr. KTH 41. Res. f. språk- o. ind:stud. i Tyskl., Engl., Danm. 33-39. Anst. v. Fodens Co. Ltd i Sandbach, Engl., 39, s. kyltekn. h. Koop. förb. i Sthlm 42-44, direktörsassist. v. Ohs Bruk A-B fr. 44. Styr:led. där, i Ry-daholms Kraft- o. Ind. A-B, ordf. i Osbruks koop. fören.
translated: Berglund, Sannfred Robert Stig, civil engineer, born on December 2nd, 1916 in Fors bruk, Kopparb. 1., to director Erik B. and Lotten Sundelin. Married in 1944 to Ingegerd Mimmi Enquist. He graduated from Växjö in 1935 and from Schartaus’ handelsinstitut in 1936, then went on to graduate from KTH in 1941. He traveled to Germany, England, and Denmark from 1933-1939 to study language and industry. He worked for Fodens Co. Ltd in Sandbach, England in 1939, then became a cooling technology expert for the Kooperativa Förbundet in Stockholm from 1942-1944. From 1944, he was the assistant director of Ohs Bruk A-B, where he is also on the board of directors. He is also on the board of Ry-daholms Kraft- o. Ind. A-B and is the chairman of the Osbruks cooperative association.
